name: Bloodgore
description:
BLOODGORE

Early Alpha

A Brutal hack and slash game where you fight the demon armies of hell.

You can find me on twitter https://twitter.com/WoricThings .

BIG MARCH 2018 UPDATE
New Overworld Map
New Village Level Type
New Upgrades
New Boneyard Level Type
New Hoard Enemy Type


Controls
mouse and keyboard or controller
W,A,S,D to move
mouse to attack and aim
most weapons have 2 abilities
mouse wheel to swap weapons

Credits
Code/Design/Art/Sound
Warwick Urquhart

Music
Ossuary 2 - Turn Kevin MacLeod (incompetech.com)
Ossuary 5 - Rest Kevin MacLeod (incompetech.com)
Ossuary 7 - Resolve Kevin MacLeod (incompetech.com)
